data.name: TS Marketplace: North Jersey Coast & Morristown Lines Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
data.detailed_description:
Train Simulator’s North Jersey Coast & Morristown Lines route is host to 100+ route miles of contemporary American commuter railroading – and now the new North Jersey Coast & Morristown Lines Scenario Pack 01 puts you at the throttle for realistic, diverse, and challenging NJ Transit ® commuter operations!

The latest release in Train Simulator partner programme member High Iron Simulations’ best-selling series of scenario packs, North Jersey Coast & Morristown Lines Scenario Pack 01 features ten challenging career scenarios based upon authentic operations that will put you at the controls of NJ Transit ® electric, diesel, and dual-power locomotives; classic EMUs; and “push-pull” cab cars. You’ll be called for duty to and from famed New York Penn Station and historic Hoboken Terminal for scheduled operations on both NJT’s iconic Morristown Line to Dover and bustling NJCL rail route down the Jersey Shore.

Developed by noted scenario author Gary Dolzall, North Jersey Coast & Morristown Lines Scenario Pack 01 features authentic experiences operating a variety of modern commuter locomotives and equipment, including NJ Transit’s ® ALP-45DP dual-power locomotive, powerful ALP-46 electric, veteran EMD GP40PH-2B, iconic Arrow III EMU; and distinctive Comet IV and Multi-Level “push pull” cab cars.

Note: The pack’s scenarios require the North Jersey Coast & Morristown Lines route (which includes the ALP-45DP and ALP-46) and content from the NEC: New York - New Haven route.
Select individual scenarios also require Train Simulator’s NJ Transit ® Arrow III EMU and NJ Transit ® GP40PH-2B (each DLC available separately).
In North Jersey Coast & Morristown Lines Scenario Pack 01 and its ten career scenarios, you’ll discover and enjoy new challenging, realistic, and diverse contemporary commuter railroading!

Included Career Scenarios:

  • Dover Bound, Part 1
  • Dover Bound, Part 2
  • Midtown Direct, Part 1
  • Midtown Direct, Part 2
  • Boonton Line Inbound
  • Trenton Local
  • Long Branch Bound
  • NJ Transit ® M-O-W Extra
  • Arrows to Hoboken
  • Coast Line Arrows

data.short_description: Train Simulator’s North Jersey Coast & Morristown Lines route is host to 100+ route miles of contemporary American commuter railroading – and now the new North Jersey Coast & Morristown Lines Scenario Pack 01 puts you at the throttle for realistic, diverse, and challenging NJ Transit ® commuter operations!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows® 7 / 8.1
  • Processor:Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:512 MB - 1GB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:40 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
  • Graphics:Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
